mapper.select: SELECT child.MENU_CODE, parent.MENU_ID, parent.MENU_NAME FROM SYS_MENU_INFO child LEFT JOIN SYS_MENU_INFO parent on child.PARENT_MENU_CODE = parent.MENU_CODE where child.PARENT_MENU_CODE = #{parentMenuCode}
select parent.MENU_ID from SYS_MENU_INFO child left join SYS_MENU_INFO parent on child.MENU_CODE = parent.MENU_CODE where child.MENU_CODE = #{childId}

SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM SYS_MENU_INFO m INNER JOIN SYS_ROLE_MENU rm ON rm.MENU_CODE = m.MENU_CODE INNER JOIN SYS_USER_ROLE ur ON ur.ROLE_ID = rm.ROLE_ID INNER JOIN SYS_ROLE_INFO r ON ur.ROLE_ID = r.ROLE_ID INNER JOIN SYS_USER_INFO u ON u.USER_ID = ur.USER_ID WHERE u.USERNAME = #{username} AND m.DISABLE = 0 AND r.DISABLE = 0 AND u.DISABLE = 0 ORDER BY m.SORT DESC
SELECT m.* FROM SYS_MENU_INFO m INNER JOIN SYS_ROLE_MENU rm ON rm.MENU_CODE = m.MENU_CODE WHERE rm.ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
